thread.title: WATCH LIVE: Ramaphosa answers questions in Parliament
thread.title_full: WATCH LIVE: Ramaphosa answers questions in Parliament | News24

author: news24.com
title: WATCH LIVE: Ramaphosa answers questions in Parliament
text:
Watch live as Deputy President Cyril Ramaphosa answers questions in the National Council of Provinces.
Ramaphosa is to shed light on plans to improve the efficiency of key state-owned enterprises such as South African Airways, Eskom and the South African Post Office at a parliament briefing on Wednesday.
